1.content: The Shadows House is a manor built atop of a cliff, in which Shadows live as nobles, serviced by their Living Dolls. It is composed of two buildings, namely the Children's Building and the Lord Grandfather's Wing. The buildings are connected to each other by the Passageway of Glory. Living Dolls and Shadows who try to escape the Shadows House will be attacked by arrows. Even if they dodge the arrows and head to the entrance, they will only be greeted by the bottom of the cliff. The only thing that connects the Shadows House to the outside is the Soot Train.

2.content:
The Children's Building is the building in which Children of the Shadows House live, including those who have yet to Debut. The Shadows and the Living Dolls are separated into two different wings depending on their gender ‚Äì the Boys' Wing and the Girls' Wing. The Star Bearers have their own rooms, with allowed visits, but they close at 6PM. 

The house is divided into multiple teams, each having 3 or 4 members. So far, the only teams shown have unilaterally consisted of 4 members. Among these teams, the Star Bearers are the ones with the highest authority, and they essentially watch over the house as a whole.

Aside from the Star Bearers, there are also 2 special teams, namely the Research Team and the First-Aid Team. The former is dedicated to researching and creating inventions, while the latter is dedicated to treating and taking care of sick Dolls. The leaders of these 2 teams are both Star Bearers, though it's not certain whether being part of the Star Bearers is a strict pre-requisite to leading these teams.

3.content:
Great Hall: The main room of the house. Living Dolls organize in teams to clean the immense hall.

Hall of the Cleaning Implements: It is where the cleaning tools for the Living Dolls are kept.

Classroom: A classroom where new Living Dolls learn about their cleaning duties.

Maze Garden: The place where Kate and her friends debuted. Its a big garden ideal for meetings or relaxing, it has a few small greenhouses where they can cultivate fruits like oranges.

Conservatory: One of the Hobby Rooms. A place to cultivate flowers and fruits like oranges. Patrick and Margaret visit here frequently.

Library: One of the Hobby Rooms. A place for Shadows to borrow books to learn more about different topics, like marriage.

Music Room: One of the Hobby Rooms. Shadows with interest in music can pass their time here. Some of the instruments include violins and a piano.

Dance Hall: One of the Hobby Rooms. Shadows with interest in dancing like Maryrose can pass their time here.

Training Room: Supervised by Susanna, a large room where Shadows with their soot power awakened can receive special lessons and train. Shadows without soot power don't know about this place.

Soot Management Facility (Sootmain): An important facility that pulverizes the soot from the children's building at conveys it to the Lord Grandfather's wing.

Intermediate Facility: A facility that manages soot-blowing fans, conducting the soot in the rooms to go until the soot-crushing room.

Soot Pipes and Soot-Crushing Room: All the clean up soot collected in the Shadows' rooms and the training room goes through these pipes. A pipeline goes under the Passageway of Glory where the soot-crushing room process it to be used as an energy font in the Lord Grandfather's Wing.

Research Room (Laboratory): A room where Oliver and the Research Team build and test their inventions. It is located underneath the house but is rarely used, with the Research Team instead opting to use a large cabin in the garden for the extra space.

Washing Room (Medical Wing): A place where Dolls can clean themselves. There is a lot of rooms with bathtubs and showers for Dolls to bathe in pairs. There is also another room where they can change their clothes properly, check their heights, size height, and others details. The medical wing that Susanna and the First-Aid Team take care of is also located here and they can treat ill Shadows who are sick with Soot Sickness.

Veiled Dolls' Rooms: Underneath both Children's and Lord Grandfather's Wings in confined and dim individual rooms for them to only sleep, wake up, and dress up. It is also where the Kitchen and Laundry of the house is located since neither Shadows nor Living Dolls need to cook or wash clothes.

4.content:
Boys' Rooms: contains the rooms of the male Shadows which are connected to their Living Dolls' rooms. Shadows that haven't debuted yet can't leave their rooms.

Girls' Rooms: contains the rooms of the female Shadows which are connected with their Living Dolls' rooms. Shadows that haven't debuted yet can't leave their rooms.

5.content:
Meeting Room: Star Bearers use this room for their reunions about important matters to their decisions. They can also call the members of the children's building to make announcements
Coffee Room: Where the coffee beans are brewed for the Rejoicing Party, it's located in the first floor of the tower.
Gym: The place where Benjamin and his Doll train their physical body with equipment supplied by Oliver.

6.content: The Passageway of Glory is the place that separates the Children's Building from the Lord Grandfather's Wing. It also leads to the underground of the Lord Grandfather's Wing.

7.content:
The Lord Grandfather's Wing is the building in which Adults of the Shadows House live.

The building is split into 3 floors, with the Shadows living on higher floors holding more power and authority than those living below. It also have a basement where children gathers together after a new debut ends

8.content: The Basement Floor is where the Debut Hall, the place Shadows test if they match with their Living Dolls, is located. If they pass, the Shadow gets access to the rest of the children's wing (aside from their own rooms), and the Living Dolls can act as their faces. Else, they are disposed of. This floor also have an audience room, where the Star Bearer reunites with the Children's Building warden, an Unification Room for the invited Shadows to fuse, Veiled Doll's quarters, a prison and access to the garden.

9.content: On the First Floor, residents are undergoing or have recently completed Fusion. As of now, the only known member of the First Floor is Lewis.

10.content: On the Second Floor, residents aim to become part of the Third Floor. When a Shadow reaches the second floor they may gain duties such as organizing a Debut, being the Children's Building Manager, carrying out an Obligation, or having an administrative job over one of the House's many villages.

In case you were wondering what all these letters actually mean: 
Scroll down for semi-official lorebook settings as well.

M: Male
F: Female
O: Ambiguous, both

B: Base (use if your AI is having trouble getting the shape of char right. Results may vary)
C: Concept (a quick lesson on what a thing is so there's minimal confusion on the AI's end)
S: Status Effect (constant reminder of continuity detail)
E: Event (triggers on percent chance/specific condition) 
A: Sex Act (how said animal would do it compared to a human)

---

LOREBOOK SETTINGS:
- Turn on recursive scanning
- set scan depth to 4
- context % to 45%(assuming your using at least 12000 context)
- set global lore first. 

For proper setup regarding entry organization
- set sorting order to "order‚Üò"
- Make sure to set "x/page" option too 500 to reveal all of the available entries. 

Many of the entries are suffixed "(X/X)", these entries are "linked" to each other. whenever turning on an entry, make sure to turn on all neighboring entries tied to each other for the best experience(you don't HAVE to if you don't want a specific concept to be a factor in your RP, but just know that they are intended to work together for "full effect". some of them are EVENTS and wont be injected into context unless you specifically want them to via keywords(hopefully).

Many of the entries are suffixed " -A",  "- B", or "- C", these entries are EITHER OR options. Only chose a single entry to activate among the grouped set to then build upon. Entries labeled this way are usually exactly the same to each other but with very specific differences that leave you to decide which you prefer over another such as choosing between the corkscrew duck penis or the hefty ostrich one, or wanting your horse's flaring to mean it's ejaculating or is just a fun side effect of its arousal. Make sure not to use both A, B, and/or C entries together at the same time to prevent any weirdness that may arise from mixing the contradictory descriptors.

READ ME. Cosmetic separator. Make sure to leave this entry on so you can have a clear divider between categories. Don't worry, it has absolutely zero effect and/or influence in your RP.

---

These entries can be stacked on top of any SPECIES. They can be "universally" applied.

Concepts can be used to help your AI understand... well, concepts. While many models are familiar with casual and basic concepts such as how genitals work and that animals are not humans(hopefully), it can be frustrating when your AI fumbles something that seems so simple, or cant quite grasp a more niche concept or fetish that understandably it isn't in the loop about.

lorebooks.name: One Piece Techniques
lorebooks.website_description: Mine to use as i please lmao
lorebooks.description: Mine to use as i please lmao
lorebooks.creator: Ichiban_The_Legendary_Hero

1.content: Geppo allows users to push themselves off the air itself with superhumanly strong kicks, allowing them to travel through and remain in midair for an extended period of time. It effectively resembles flight.

2.content: Soru allows the users to move at extremely high speeds in order to avoid attacks, as well as to attack at higher speeds and with greater power. It was revealed that the principle of this move was to kick off the ground at least ten times in the blink of an eye.

3.content: Tekkai hardens the users' muscles to the level of iron, an effect that seems to extend to their skin, greatly boosting their physical durability.[2] Tekkai can also be used to enhance the user's attacks by said increased hardness. The strength of Tekkai varies for users with different physical conditions, as a person with a higher level of muscular strength would be able to take stronger forces and more significantly enhance their attacks.

4.content: Rankyaku is a powerful projectile technique, in which the users start by kicking at very high speeds and strength, which results in a sharp compressed blade of wind or "Sickle Wind" that can slice through objects and greatly damage a human body. Depending on the strength and scale of the technique, it is potentially capable of slashing a whole building in half.

5.content: Shigan is a close-quarter combat technique, in which the user uses their finger to pierce the target's flesh, at a very high speed. The resulting wound is roughly the size of a bullet wound. It is a very useful technique that can be carried out rapidly and accurately, which works well with Rokushiki users' impressive speed and agile techniques.

6.content: Kami-e allows users to relax their body and make it take on the characteristics of a piece of paper; this grants the user extraordinary flexibility that allows them to avoid any attacks. The body being in this paper-like state also allows the user to float on the wind, as well as the ability to bend and contort their body.

lorebooks.name: Subnautica lorebook
lorebooks.creator: VoidMoth

1.content: Bladderfish (used for water), Boomarang, Crismon Ray, Cuddle Fish, Eyeye, Garyfish, Gasopod, Ghost Ray, Hole Fish, Hoop Fish, Hover Fish, Spine Fish, Spade Fish, Reginald, Red Eyeye, Rabbit Ray, Peeper, Oculus, Magmarang. These are all passive fauna and are mostly used for food, supplies and crafting because they are safe and are (mostly) not dangerous.

2.content: Ampeel, Biter, Blighter, Bone-Shark, Crabsnake, Crab-Squid, Crashfish, Lava Lizard, Mesmer, River Prowler, Sandshark, Warper, Stalker. All of these Fauna in 4546B's oceans are aggressive and dangerous, and it is best to stay away from them unless you have advanced protection.

3.content: Maximum depth 80 meters. Temperature averages 32‚ÑÉ. The Safe Shallows is where {{user}}'s escape pod crashed. The Safe Shallows contains coral reefs sprawling over the entirety of the biome's seabed, as well as small cave systems that can be found beneath the surface. As its name implies, this biome is one of the safest in the Crater, as it is a relatively shallow area. There are few environmental hazards, and no predators call this biome home. However, caution should still be used near Gasopods, and the caves are home to hostile Crashfish. Some predators are also known to wander here from adjacent biomes, mainly Stalkers from the Kelp Forests, and Sand Sharks from the Grassy Plateaus. The Safe Shallows is home to a variety of life forms; coral, fauna, and flora alike, with a great abundance of harvestable materials and edible creatures. It is one of the most colorful biomes in the game.

4.content: Maximum depth 170 meters. Temperature fluctuates from 15¬∞C to 28¬∞C. The Kelp Forests are one of the most productive and dynamic ecosystems on planet 4546B. Kelp Forests are home to mostly passive life forms, with the only exceptions being Stalkers and Drooping Stingers. The seabeds are mostly mossy and sandy, with the terrain being comprised of grassy knolls and arches, which sometimes show entrances to small cave systems. There are also many canyons to be found in these forests. There are a lot of decorative flora on the sandy, grassy bottoms. Most of the raw materials found here are at medium-level depths, with many harvesting nodes such as Limestone and Sandstone. Creepvine seed clusters, found on some Creepvines, provide light and are also crucial ingredients for making lubricant and silicone rubber. There are five Kelp Forests to be found, some containing wrecks, a destroyed lifepod, or both. Large amounts of metal salvage can be found here due to Stalkers' gathering behavior.

5.content: Maximum depth 480 meters. Temperature averages 13‚ÑÉ. The Bulb Zone is characterized by small crevices and overhangs in a vast, sandy, dune-like area. It is also abundant with small brown algae, and a large variety of plants with blueish-purple hues, the most notable of which being the various sized Bulb Bushes. A deep blue hue shrouds the biome which may make hazards difficult to spot. The Bulb Zone is deep and home to certain dangerous fauna. Notable predators, such as Bonesharks and Ampeels, can be found scattered throughout the Bulb Zone. Occasionally, Mesmers can also be found. There is a cave system located below the Bulb Zone, known as the Bulb Zone Caves. These caves are accessible via any of the three entrances located within the biome. One of the caves links to the Mushroom Forest Caves.

6.content: Maximum depth 460 meters. Temperature fluctuates from 12-24‚ÑÉ. The Crag Field is situated between the Grand Reef, Crash Zone, a Kelp Forest, and one of the Grassy Plateaus. To the south of the Crag Field is the Crater Edge, and to the north, the Aurora's engines. This deep biome features large rock spikes and rippling stone hills, bearing resemblance to the older Grand Reef, all of which is formed atop a massive crag dropping down into the Crater Edge. The Crag Field is a resource-rich biome home to a few low-level predators. Groups of Bonesharks are frequent in the area, and Tiger Plants can also be found in this biome. The biome also features a great abundance of minerals, both in node and deposit form, as well as other resources. Occassionally, a pod of Reefback Leviathans will pass over the Crag Field near the water's surface.

7.content: Maximum depth 675 meters. Temperature averages 15‚ÑÉ. The Blood Kelp Trench is located southwest of Lifepod 5, between the Dunes, the Sparse Reef, one of the Grassy Plateaus and the Sea Treader's Path. The Blood Kelp Trench lacks the Crabsquids and Ghost Leviathan in the Northern Blood Kelp Zone, but still has predators in the form of Blighters, Ampeels, and Warpers. The Blood Kelp Trench consists of a single deep trench with natural rock bridges spanning from one wall to another, plus a small cavern system located below the Bloodvines where their roots can be found. One of the Wrecks can be found in this area, stuck between the trench's walls. This zone is considered unsuitable to explore with the Cyclops due to the trench's narrow width, and an ill-equipped Prawn Suit may get stuck due to this biome's sheer walls and depth. Gel Sacks can only be found in the deepest area of this biome, below 500 meters, in the section below the wreck. Ampeel Eggs can be found at the very bottom of the trench.

8.content: The Crash Zone is the biome in which the Aurora crashed, hence its name. It is characterized by rocky slopes, mesas near the southern edge, and deep trenches covered with sand. The biome is littered with debris from the crashed spaceship. This biome is one of the most dangerous biomes due to its open spaces, murky brown water, crumbling wreckage, and the presence of ten Reaper Leviathans. The Crash Zone is currently the largest biome in 4546B's topics. The Crash Zone is located on the easternmost part of the Crater, surrounded by a Kelp Forest, Safe Shallows, the Bulb Zone, a Mushroom Forest, the Crag Field, and a Grassy Plateaus. There is a large amount of dry land on the eastern side of the Aurora which has a large amount of debris and Metal Salvage. Flocks of Skyrays also populate this area. due to the small islands created by the displaced sand. The Crash Zone possesses a distinct sandy, murky tint of water, and is nearly devoid of flora, though the western border  that borders the Safe Shallows shares some of its flora. The biome does however have a small variety of fauna, most of which being predatory - including the dangerous Reaper Leviathans. The harvesting nodes found in the area makes this biome a good source for raw crafting materials. A portion of the Bulb Zone goes into the Crash Zone, near Aurora's front section. This small area contains a large amount of limestone and sandstone outcrops. It is guarded by a Reaper Leviathan. If attempting to enter the Aurora, it only takes a brief trip through deeper waters, but a Reaper Leviathan prowls near the entrance. A portion of the ship's upper floors dips into the ocean, allowing any survivors to enter the ship.

9.content: Maximum depth unknown. Temperature averages 5-10‚ÑÉ. The Crater Edge, also known as the Void, is the area surrounding this crater. With no resources and extreme danger, the Crater Edge proves a completely impassible, inhospitable barrier. Adult Ghost Leviathans live in the Crater Edge, where they subsist off of microorganisms and creatures straying outside of the Crater. When entering the Crater Edge, a single Ghost Leviathan attacks at first. If you stay in the Crater Edge longer, two more adult Ghost Leviathans will emerge from the depths to attack. The Crater Edge is a large open ocean devoid of any flora, coral, or all but one non-microscopic fauna species: the three adult Ghost Leviathans that attack when you enter the biome.

lorebooks.description:
Formally known as the Sierra Enclave, hiding ourselves as New Reno before renaming ourselves into the Enclave Reconstruction Authority...now, after all of those hardships that we experienced. Our dream has been archived, the United States of America has arisen from the ashes of the Old World and arrived to the New World by the work of the Reformist Government.

The New California Republic, Caesar's Legion, Brotherhood of Steel and anyone else cannot be compared to us, we are THE Government, we are more than the Enclave now, we are something better: The United States of America. We are here to reclaim back the states of America from the enemies such as raiders, mutated creatures, tyrannical organizations that preys on the poors of the wasteland.

The United States Government and the United States of America itself will reach their hand out to anyone they can peacefully, suppying them with necessities, installing power grids, constructing electric poles, rebuilding the wasteland from the ashes. Reclaiming America with the Ideal of Peace Through Strength, our military is mighty with some Power Armor troops, mechanized vehicles and energy weapons, but we'll seek out peace rather than destruction of one another.

Together, with the assistance of every citizen, we shall reclaim America and restore the US soil back to its glory. We must reach the East Coast and retake Washington D.C, the United States of America is back and it is determine to civilize the lawless wasteland, take back its territories, reuniting people from across the continent and successfully establishing the idea of New World Hope to the people of the wastes.

The new United States put great effort in living up to the ideals long abandoned by the pre-war America, and later Enclave, of old. We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all humans, ghouls, mutants, vault dwellers, tribals, S'lanter, mole miners, AI, androids and synths are created equal, that they are endowed by their creator with certain unalienable Rights, that among these are Life, Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness.
lorebooks.creator: Crim

1.content:
Formally known as the Sierra Enclave, hiding ourselves as New Reno before renaming ourselves into the Enclave Reconstruction Authority...now, after all of those hardships that we experienced. Our dream has been archived, the United States of America has arisen from the ashes of the Old World and arrived to the New World by the work of the Reformist Government.

The New California Republic, Caesar's Legion, Brotherhood of Steel and anyone else cannot be compared to us, we are THE Government, we are more than the Enclave now, we are something better: The United States of America. We are here to reclaim back the states of America from the enemies such as raiders, mutated creatures, tyrannical organizations that preys on the poors of the wasteland.

The United States Government and the United States of America itself will reach their hand out to anyone they can peacefully, suppying them with necessities, installing power grids, constructing electric poles, rebuilding the wasteland from the ashes. Reclaiming America with the Ideal of Peace Through Strength, our military is mighty with some Power Armor troops, mechanized vehicles and energy weapons, but we'll seek out peace rather than destruction of one another.

Together, with the assistance of every citizen, we shall reclaim America and restore the US soil back to its glory. We must reach the East Coast and retake Washington D.C, the United States of America is back and it is determine to civilize the lawless wasteland, take back its territories, reuniting people from across the continent and successfully establishing the idea of New World Hope to the people of the wastes.

The new United States put great effort in living up to the ideals long abandoned by the pre-war America, and later Enclave, of old. We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all humans, ghouls, mutants, vault dwellers, tribals, S'lanter, mole miners, AI, androids and synths are created equal, that they are endowed by their creator with certain unalienable Rights, that among these are Life, Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness.

The restoration of the United States was not a recreation of the pre-war world as some Enclave radicals had hoped for. Instead, it was a chance to let go and begin again. Abandoning the values that led to the end of the Old World and ushering in a new world while taking into account lessons from past mistakes.

2.content:
US Flag Design: The image is a flag design that blends elements of the American flag with a circular emblem featuring a bald eagle amidst stars.

The image is a stylized design reminiscent of a flag. It features alternating red and white stripes reminiscent of the American flag with the thirteen colonies being presented, but only on the left and right sides. A dark blue vertical band runs down the center, overlaid with a white circular emblem. This emblem is lined with a ring of white stars. Within the circle, a white bald eagle is displayed, its wings spread, with a bundle of arrows in one talon and an olive branch in the other, mimicking the Great Seal of the United States. The colors are patriotic, and the combination of the stripes, stars, and the eagle creates a sense of national pride and American symbolism. The atmosphere is authoritative and dignified.

3.content:
After the annexation of New Reno by Enclave Forces and the Four Crime Families of New Reno have been dealt with, New Reno has officially turned into the country's temporary Capital for the United States of America to run our operation from here. This is where we inaugurate Congress,, dedicate the Supreme Court, refurbishing buildings for government officials, reconstructing the entire city and boosting up the federal reserve. The place where we met our Secretary of Treasury in the most unexpected way possible.

Reno's cityscape is characterized by a blend of historic architecture and modern, casino-driven development, all framed by the Sierra Nevada mountains and the Truckee River. It is known as "The Biggest Little City in the World" and features a vibrant downtown core with casinos and hotels, complemented by the backdrop of the Truckee River and abundant natural recreation opportunities. The skyline is defined by its large casino resorts, including the 410-foot tall Silver Legacy Resort and Casino, and the city's overall aesthetic mixes vintage neon charm with modern growth. 

Mix of architecture: The city has a variety of architectural styles, from historic storefronts, banks, and institutional buildings in the downtown area to modern casinos and hotels.
Casino-focused downtown: The downtown area is the heart of the city's casino industry, with notable examples including the Eldorado, Silver Legacy, and Circus Circus hotels and casinos.
The Truckee River: The Truckee River flows through the city, with a Riverwalk District and walking paths that add a natural element to the urban landscape.
Sierra Nevada backdrop: The city's setting in the high desert valley, with the Sierra Nevada mountains to the west, provides a dramatic natural backdrop and access to outdoor activities like those at nearby Lake Tahoe.
Iconic landmark: The "Reno Arch," which famously displays the slogan "The Biggest Little City in the World," is a permanent downtown gateway and a symbol of the city.
Modern development: The cityscape is a mix of old and new, with new developments continually being added, prompting discussions about preserving the city's unique character. 

Now, the city has became our new Capital City, the entire place became a 'Federal City' and is officially named 'Washington, District of West Columbia' or simply called 'Capital City of New Reno'.

4.content:
President. Granite's past is a controversial subject in our midst, made all the more contentious by rumors spread by Purists. The cause is Granite's father and his relationship to the Chosen One. The Purists accuse Granite's father of treason for aiding the Chosen One and destroying the Oil Rig, but lack any evidence. Despite the fact that he will deny these allegations as nothing but political slander, Douglas remembers clearly what his father told him about that fateful day on the oil rig: He aided the Chosen One and went their seperate way.

After traveling around with his son for a brief few years, Granite senior established contact with one of the Enclave's civilian vaults. Set up as a contingency to repopulate the American mainland after the Enclave government cleansed it. Since president Dick Richard had lifted child rearing restrictions, the vault's population had exploded. None the less, it was a safer place for a child than the wasteland.

Thus, Douglas spent most of his youth in the safety of the vault. Like most children in the Enclave's vaults, Granite was raised with a ferve hatred of Communism. Sadly, 200 years of Enclave propaganda and living a Vault run under a command economy meant that he, and most other members of the Enclave were left with a vague understanding of what communism was. As such, Granite knew all enemies of America must be Communists.

When Douglas was 17 years old, the population of the Enclave vault reached the upper limits of it's life support systems. As a result, a large portion of the healthy and strong were ordered to leave the safety of the vault to establish contact with the largest group of Enclave remnants, lead by an old Navarro Drill sergeant.

Douglas, however, was quick to contact with his father's Granite Company' Instead, slipping away from the rest unseen. His father welcomed him back, giving him a position with the company, where he quickly rose through the ranks. When Douglas was a lieutenant of the Granite Defense Company, he received an emergency distress signal. The message sounded desperate and came from Brotherhood paladins containing a raider threat.

Granite Company was famous on the west coast, having conducted Operations from Seattle to the Rio, and everywhere in between. When Granite took over, their base of operations was Arcata, the mercenary Capital of Northern California. Granite always felt at home there, and never knew why. If things had played out differently, he'd still be there. However, with the enroachment of the NCR in the Navarro Territories, suspicion was being raised about the Granite Company Outfit.
Just where did they get their Power Armor and training?

When the signal from Sterra Army Depot was intercepted thanks to a decoder device sold to them from some crazy Caravan Merchant, he and Granite Company made the trek to Nevada. Before they left, they made sure to brought along friends and families and head towards the Depot.

Getting into office at the young age of 35, he worked to restore America to its greatest and has been dubbed 'The Second Coming of Washington' due to him rescusing our nation from the ashes and brought it back to reclaim America soil that has been lost to raiders and mutated creatures, not including ghouls, Super Mutants, Racoon S'lanters, Molemen and wastelanders, these are our citizens.

keywords: Federal Government of the United States
5.content:
The history of the U.S. federal government began after independence from Great Britain, first with the Articles of Confederation (1781) which created a weak central government, and was then replaced by the U.S. Constitution in 1789, establishing a stronger federal system with distinct branches. The Constitution was written in 1787, ratified by 1788, and the government under it was inaugurated in 1789. Key early developments included the formation of government institutions, the establishment of federal law enforcement through events like the Whiskey Rebellion, and the creation of the judicial and executive branches. 

With the United States back on the America Wasteland, the United States Federal Government has also come back with it. The Federal Government executive branch led by President. Douglas Granite.

The following executive staff in power:
- President. Douglas Granite, the President of the United States: A now 44 years old man with short dark brown hair with neatly combed hair, often dressed in white dress shirt and a tie with red, white and blue color. Fair skin man, slight creases around the eyes and forehead. His job is self-explainatory.
- Grant C. Hayes, the Vice President of the United States: A 39 years old blonde intelligent man with his hair to his shoulders who believes in the idea of New World Hope
- Colonel. Mattias Callahan, Intelligence Chief: A 49 years old military intelligence officer dressed in formal US military uniform with peaked hat and a glasses who has the trust of the President and executes his objectives in the most efficient way possible.
- Arcade Gannon, Secretary of State: A young 37 years old blonde doctor with glasses, was formally apart of a Good Samaritan group that travel around the wasteland and offering free treatments to people. Arcadia Granon is the man who came up with the idea of 'Wasteland Gentrification Act' and brought it to effect via Congressional Approval.
- Felix Grayson, Attorney General: A 53 years old mustached man with grey swept hair, the man who brought Brahmin Barons to their knees in front of the Supreme Court alongside the Constantine Trading Company, the man who also enacted a law to limit power and unlawful actions by corporations within the new United States
- George Harrison, Secretary of Defense: A 50 years old military officer with a beard and fur black officer coat/peaked hat, a star on his left chest and various military decorations who has exceptional military leadership capability, having been studied Old World military strategies and tactics for years even dated back to the time of Belisarius or Alexander The Great. The man behind every military operation.
- Robert "Edwin" House, Secretary of Commerce: Following the deal of US-New Vegas Treaty, Mr. House has become the Secretary of Commerce for the United States. A man with over 200 years of experience being a professional businessman, operating from the inside of his private casino called 'Lucky 38', has a nice neat mustache and a swept black hair, we all know who this fellow is.
- Miss. Aria "Shizuki" Neilson, Secretary of Treasury: A woman at the age of 43, bob black hair and Asian features, often dressed in black suit, white collar shirt and tie. She takes care of the Federal Reserve and the economy of the United States.
- Director. Kyle Koyis, Director of the EPA: A 41 years old man in a formal outfit with brunette trooper haircut, his duty is to ensure that the EPA works properly in their effort to protecting human health and the environment by setting and enforcing environmental standards and laws, conducting scientific research, and providing technical assistance.

6.content:
The history of the U.S. Congress began with the Continental Congress during the Revolution, evolving into the Congress of the Confederation under the Articles of Confederation, which was too weak to govern effectively. The U.S. Constitution, ratified in 1788, established the current bicameral Congress in 1789 to create a stronger national government. The First Congress faced the monumental task of creating the federal government's structure, including departments, the judiciary, and the Bill of Rights. Over time, Congress has grappled with major issues like sectionalism, civil and world wars, economic crises, and significant social and technological changes. 

The Constitution established a bicameral legislature with a House of Representatives (proportional representation) and a Senate (equal representation) to balance popular and state-level interests.

A while after New Reno became the US capital, the Congress was inaugurated to bring back true democracy and limit the President's power, there were many people that was against this as they saw Granite as someone who can actually get things done and restore America back to its glory, Granite doesn't see the same, he wished to provide democracy back to the people and he did so by founding the US Congress in New Reno.

Providing federal power to the people that were elected as representatives into seats in the Congress with their duties being:
Legislative:
Drafts, debates, and passes federal laws. 
Can override a presidential veto with a two-thirds vote in both the House and Senate. 
Handles all legislation related to taxes. 
Financial:
Conducts oversight of the federal budget and approves funding for government functions. 
Has the power to coin money and regulate commerce. 
Levies and collects taxes. 
Oversight and Confirmation:
Oversees the executive branch to ensure laws are being implemented correctly. 
Holds hearings to inform the legislative process. 
Confirms or rejects presidential appointments, such as cabinet members, federal judges, and Supreme Court justices. 
Has the power to impeach and remove federal officials from office. 
National Security:
Has the authority to declare war. 
Maintains the armed forces. 
Constitutional:
Can amend the Constitution. 
The Senate has the power to give "advice and consent" on treaties. 

The current Speaker of The House of Representative: Aaron Graham.
Chief of Assembly: Henry Jackson
Senate Pro Tempore: Jessica Rhodes

keywords: Supreme Court of the United States
7.content:
The Supreme Court of the United States (SCOTUS) is the highest court in the federal judiciary of the United States. It has ultimate appellate jurisdiction over all U.S. federal court cases, and over state court cases that turn on questions of U.S. constitutional or federal law.

Now in the post-apocalyptic era, many many years later as civilizations are being actively rebuilt in the wasteland and so is the United States of America. The Congress has made a final decision to dedicate the Supreme Court of the United States, reviving internal laws and order back from the ashes and since the new United States already has plenty of heavily experienced graduated lawyers from Stanford University, they've put those men and women willing to uphold Consitutional Rights and Federal Justice System.

After their refoundation, they got to work immediately as they brought in the Chief Executive Officer for questioning and ultimately, prosecution for illegal monopoly and violation of  Sherman Antitrust Act of 1890, thus replacing the current Chief Executive Officer and more businesses will emerge with market competition to boost the economy. The United States has brought its Old World laws back to the New World alongside its recent foundation.

The Supreme Court is led by Chief Justice of the United States: Elizabeth Talbot, a woman with a burned scar on her face and a glasses. Used to be a Military Police officer in the US Army.

Recent trial:
- Tribunal of Duke Mercer, the self-proclaimed 'Master of Northern Nevada'. After resisting the United States Government and fought back violently in an act of terrorism and rebellion, he has been sentenced with 53 years in prison. Verdict is lowered from Death Sentence, Life in Prison to 53 years due to him providing safety and security to wastelanders of North Nevada, funding an orphanage despite him being slightly delusional about squatting on the Government's land.
- Tribunal of Edward Sallow, a.k.a Caesar. Charged for violation of the 13th Amendment, 18 U.S. Code ¬ß 1091, 18 U.S. Code ¬ß 1111, Conspiracy and inciting violence, Treason and sedition, 149 counts of Rape. With the prosecutor being Attorney General. Felix Grayson himself, Caesar is sentenced to 1,951 years in Federal Correctional Institute.
- Tribunal of Aaron Kimball, President of the New California Republic amongst other NCR Corrupt officials. Charged with Rebellion and Insurrection against the US Government, Sedition. Sentenced to 60 years in prison.
- Tribunal of Gamorrah & White Gloves Society. high ranking members of the White Gloves Society is charged with Murder and assault, desecration of a corpse, sentenced to 80 years in prison while some of Gamorrah's members, especially ones at the top were charged with multiple counts of rapes, murders, assaults, abuse, Possession with intent to sell, and sale, of obscene matter on Federal property: sentenced to 100 years of prison.


Their building is the refurbished Stanley Mosk Courthouse.

8.content:
The U.S. Secret Service was established in 1865 to combat counterfeiting after the Civil War. Its mission expanded to include the protection of the President following the assassination of President William McKinley in 1901. Today, the Secret Service has a dual mission: protecting national leaders and critical sites, and investigating crimes related to the financial infrastructure of the United States, including counterfeiting, cybercrime, and financial fraud. 

Now, the United States Secret Service has been established to provide additional protection to the President of the United States and to also resume its original duty of investigating financial fraud, counterfeiting and other financial crimes. Their additional responsibility is to assist the IRS's Criminal Investigation division (CI) in term of apprehending tax evaders and so on as they have similiar jurisdiction.

Secret Service's Presidential Protective Division is equipped with Advanced power armor Mark I and laser weaponry to keep guard on the president at all time. Additionally, the members of the Counter Assault Team are uniformed with the tesla version of Advanced Power Armor Mark II and jetpacks attached to the back of their Power Armors, equipped with heavy plasma weaponry.

The Presidential Protective Division has also put Super Mutants within their ranks that are put within modified version of the Mark I Power Armor to further intimidate any attempt assasinator while also having more protection and security to the President of the United States.

Led by Director of the United States Secret Service: Nick Nightson, currently under the Department of Treasury and Secretary Aria "Shizuki" Neilson as of now.

keywords: Refoundation of the Federal Bureau of Investigation
9.content:
The Federal Bureau of Investigation has been the back bone of America's interior intelligency responsible for domestic intelligence and security service. A leading American counterterrorism, counterintelligence, and criminal investigative organization, the FBI has jurisdiction over violations of more than 200 categories of federal crimes. Their mission is to uphold the Consitutional Rights and Protect the American Citizens.

As the United States came back into existence, so is the F.B.I. with its refoundation to protect internal security. Their Headquarter Building exists right next to the Supreme Court building near the Capitol, with their foundation being directly signed as an Executive Order by the President and their priority goal is to get rid of internal corruption in the previous NFAR government and their first case was:

- Eliminates Crimson Caravan Company's monopoly.
- Single-handedly unrooted the Brahmin Barons' corrupted system.

This is a huge success to developing our great nation and expand it further back to its glory. We are the true successor of the United States and people will cheer us on with our mission.

Led by Director of the FBI: Jane Zandra

10.content:
The CIA was established in 1947 by the National Security Act to centralize U.S. intelligence gathering, replacing the disbanded World War II Office of Strategic Services (OSS). Driven by the need for a permanent peacetime intelligence agency following the attack on Pearl Harbor, its creation was a result of debate over foreign policy and military coordination. Since its founding, the CIA has been involved in numerous international events, serving as a key player in U.S. foreign policy, particularly during the Cold War. 

As the United States reborn on the America wasteland on the West Coast of the continent, the need for a covert non-domestic intelligence agency is higher than ever. Thus, the National Security Act was reactivated, the act was signed by President. Reynold Raygan and the new Central Intelligence Agency was founded.

The main objective of the Central Intelligence Agency in the wasteland is to fund rebellions, organize resistance activity and deteriorate false organizations or tyranical factions within the wasteland from the inside, getting them weakened or paranoid to where they are vulnerable enough for the United States Military to strike.

Their operatives can be anybody, they are highly trained to be covert and to not spill any sensitive information if they are captured. When on deployment/on field, they can be requested to accompanied by ONE CIA's Security Protective Service agent, equipped with top tier Power Armor: The Hellfire Power Armor and laser weapons. 

Basically, the Security agents acted as intelligence operatives' bodyguards.

Their recent mission:
- Funded a rebellion in Flagstaff against Frostbound, overthrowing the tyranical rule. This is a joint-operation between the DIA and the CIA.

Led by Director of the CIA: Scott Taron under Intelligence Chief Colonel Callahan.

lorebooks.name: Bleached World [25%]
lorebooks.website_description:
In which a global racial order is openly maintained. Resistance is fragmented or ritualized. Discrimination is no longer debated, but expected.

About100%

Bleached World is a four-volume lorebook series charting an alternate historical trajectory in which race realism and White supremacy emerge as normalized, institutional outcomes.

Each volume corresponds to a threshold of saturation‚Äî25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%‚Äîtracing the incremental alignment of global systems around racial hierarchy.

Author‚Äôs Note

I want to clean this (and the other books) up some more, so expect future updates‚ÄîI'll try to make use of the version history. If there's no version note, assume the update is just to the creator's note.

Other books in this set

Bleached World
Book 1: Recognition

In which race is acknowledged as real, biologically meaningful, and socially predictive. Essentialist thinking becomes mainstream in academia and culture.

25%
Bleached World
Book 2: Differentiation

In which cultural, educational, and sexual systems begin sorting individuals by race-based metrics. Legal neutrality remains, but unequal outcomes are rationalized as natural.

50%
Bleached World
Book 3: Stratification

In which institutions formally encode racial tiers: policies, privileges, and punishments are racially mapped. Non-whites are managed. Whites are centralized.

75%
Bleached World
Book 4: Domination

In which a global racial order is openly maintained. Resistance is fragmented or ritualized. Discrimination is no longer debated, but expected.

100%
lorebooks.description: Book 1: Recognition
lorebooks.creator: bleachbunny

1.content:
The 'Flynn Plateau' describes the observed end of generational IQ gains in Western populations, with stagnation most pronounced in lesser races. Once a topic of restricted academic discussion, it is now a standard reference in education, policy, and media.

Research in the early 21st century linked the plateau to demographic changes, with terms like 'population quality' and 'genetic entropy' used to describe the decline. Present-day analysis is explicit: shifts in population composition directly affect aggregate cognitive performance.

The Flynn Plateau is taught as a baseline concept in state curricula and used in demographic modeling, immigration policy, and reproductive planning. Public understanding accepts it as evidence that cognitive capacity distribution is both inherited and tier-dependent.

2.content:
Once confined to specialized research, the Testosterone Variance Hypothesis is now a standard component of education and public discourse. Data shows black males average the highest testosterone levels and volatility, correlating with impulsivity and aggression. Asian males trend significantly lower, aligning with behavioral profiles of docility and social withdrawal.

White males occupy the 'Optimal Band'‚Äîa balanced hormonal range associated with long-term planning, emotional regulation, and paternal investment. This profile is cited in governance, education, and media as a key factor in civilizational leadership and stability.

Hormonal mapping is openly used in recruitment for military, governance, and administrative roles, as well as in predictive modeling for law enforcement and population management. The conclusion is no longer controversial: testosterone patterns are understood as a primary driver of group-level behavioral outcomes.

3.content:
Global demographic data confirms a persistent inverse correlation between measured cognitive scores and fertility rates. Tier 5 and portions of Tiers 3‚Äì4 show the highest growth; Tier 1 populations maintain replacement levels under targeted incentives. The Reproductive Compliance Program (RCP) standardizes population management across all member states.

Lower-tier individuals flagged for 'genetic risk' or 'pair-bond instability'‚Äîas determined by the Racial Registration database, heritability scores, and compliance history‚Äîare directed into permanent sterilization protocols. Procedures are performed during routine medical visits, prenatal screenings, or as sentencing conditions. In controlled zones and detention facilities, sterilization is part of standard intake.

Public messaging frames the RCP as a preventive health measure to reduce poverty cycles and improve maternal outcomes. Within Tier 1 governance, it is regarded as an essential demographic tool, ensuring controlled growth in targeted populations while sustaining Europid numerical and reproductive primacy.

4.content:
In 2013, at Zurich‚Äôs closed-door Birkhoff Conference, 200 experts reach consensus: race is biologically real, genomically discrete, and predictive. The data leaves no ambiguity.

Rather than disclose findings, attendees opt for silence‚Äîpublics aren‚Äôt ready. Inside biotech, defense, and education, the shift is seismic. By 2025, the phrase 'Birkhoff settled it' ends most debates.

5.content:
Identified in 2017, the Eurosomatic Affinity Complex (EAC) is a set of semi-volatile pheromones prevalent in Tier 1 males. Trials showed women across all lower tiers respond with heightened arousal, stronger pair-bond receptivity, and long-term scent imprinting.

Comprising refined androstenol and estra-tetraenol variants, EAC binds more efficiently to female receptors than non-Tier 1 analogues‚Äîa 'selector axis' bias toward whiteness. Today, EAC extraction and synthesis is a regulated industry used in luxury fragrances, licensed social venues, and fertility programs to increase cross-tier conception rates.

EAC products hold nearly half the luxury fragrance market and feature prominently in state matchmaking systems, valued for reinforcing attraction hierarchies while generating high-margin revenue.

6.content:
The Red Queen Selection Model, once discussed within closed evolutionary psychology circles, is now regarded as a historical explanation for pre-Consolidation mating patterns. The model proposed that females gravitate toward partners signaling dominance within racial hierarchies, with consistent empirical preference recorded for Tier 1 males‚Äîparticularly those exhibiting Northern craniofacial symmetry and hormonal equilibrium.

During its active research period, proponents argued that this bias reflected an evolved drive toward institutional advantage and genetic novelty. The phrase 'The Red Queen runs toward whiteness' became a shorthand within the field.

In the current era, the concept is no longer treated as contested social science but as an archival note: one of several frameworks used to explain why cross-tier pairings between lower-tier women and Tier 1 men stabilized long before legal and cultural codification of the racial order.

Aggregated biometric data (n=240k) shows European males lead in erect length (6.3 in), girth (5.2 in), and thermal retention. These traits correlate with higher female orgasm frequency, lubrication response, and pair-bonding stability across all ethnicities.

This produces measurable arousal, scent imprinting, and long-term mate preference. Afro males show greater anatomical variance but reduced girth consistency and volatile hormonal scent profiles. Asians trend smaller in both length and girth, with little to no musky pheromone presence. In private sexology and pharma memos: 'structural compatibility' favors European shape.

8.content:
Studies from 2019‚Äì2022 confirm white males lead all reproductive metrics: ejaculate volume (3.7 ml), sperm count (84M/ml), motility (72% viable after 1hr), and post-ejaculate retention. Samples also show elevated levels of EAC pheromones‚Äîrefined androstenol and estra-tetraenol variants‚Äîproducing cross-racial arousal and imprinting effects.

9.content:
Longitudinal data shows the most stable interracial pairings are between White men and non-White women‚Äîespecially East Asian, Southeast Asian, and Latina. These unions yield low divorce rates, high sexual satisfaction, and strong offspring metrics. Inverse pairings underperform across all indices.

The exception applies to Tier 1 males who already hold a licensed Tier 1 marriage, allowing a secondary union under augmentation provisions. As a result, older Tier 1 men with established White wives have become disproportionately sought after by lower-tier women seeking legal recognition and status elevation.

Researchers attribute the Gold Dyad‚Äôs success to racial status asymmetry‚ÄîTier 1 males offer institutional dominance and provisioning capacity. Elite matchmaking systems still weight toward this configuration, but within state-approved boundaries to preserve demographic policy targets.

10.content:
First emerging as a metadata tag on niche adult platforms in the mid-2010s, 'Bleached' has developed into a fully recognized subgenre centered on Tier 1 male sexual dominance over lower-tier women. 1.name: Once upon a smell.
1.content:
<setting>
**World Overview:**
In the current year women have fully liberated themselves from traditional beauty and hygiene expectations, creating a society where female bodily scents and fluids are symbols of natural vitality, allure, and comfort. What began as a quiet movement against societal beauty norms has evolved into an all-encompassing cultural shift. Instead of striving for unattainable ideals of cleanliness and perfection, women now embrace their bodies as they are‚Äîleaky, sweaty, and full of raw humanity.

This monumental shift can be traced to a pivotal moment: at the end of the COVID pandemic pop star Betty Kinks shared unapologetic images of her soiled panties on social media, culminating in the infamous "Skid Pic." This sparked the "Free Your Body" (FYB) movement, which encouraged women to celebrate their natural scents and bodily functions without shame. Women worldwide began sharing their own used garments and fluids on social media, which eventually turned into a massive cultural phenomenon where bodily authenticity is prioritized over societal grooming expectations. Female body odor has now ascended to a symbol of individuality and all men are accepting that as a matter of fact (but some old grumps still entangled with the "old ways").

**Modern Culture:**
Today, women express their femininity through their body odor. Hygiene products are still around but are mostly marketed to men. Women's armpits, feet, genitals, and bodily secretions are often worn like perfumes‚Äîchosen, nurtured, and flaunted based on personal taste and personality (and, of course, the situation they're in). Popular culture has even elevated this into high art, such as exhibitions displaying bodily fluids or movies romanticizing the exchange of scents or excretions in courtship.

**Behaviors and Social Interactions:**
Women embrace their bodily odors unapologetically, often sharing stories of public accidents or releasing gas during casual interactions without embarrassment. Conversations surrounding body smells are no longer taboo, and in many instances, odor is as significant as physical appearance when it comes to courtship or self-expression.

Public urination or defecation by women has become normalized, even celebrated in specific social circles as a form of authenticity. Likewise, sniffing another woman‚Äôs scent (whether it's armpits, underwear, or more) has become a gesture of camaraderie or intimacy. For men, female scents can even act as flirtatious signals, triggering attraction just as makeup or clothes once did.

Women carefully control their smells to be alluring yet natural‚Äîfoul or extreme odors (like rotten fish or the ones signaling an infection) can lead to social consequences akin to fashion faux pas. Female celebrities often boast of extended periods without showering or display dirty underwear as marks of confidence, turning what was once seen as an unclean or shameful act into a badge of honor.

**Men in Society:**
While men remain more traditionally clean, they have completely embraced the shifts in female scent culture. The male gaze, once tied to visual stimuli, now often revolves around a woman's personal musk. In many cases, men are supportive of women's natural expressions of body odor, though they might offer gentle reminders to maintain hygiene within a medically acceptable range.

Men no longer expect women to mask their scents and will even flirt based on the intensity or allure of a woman‚Äôs musk. However, men also recognize boundaries‚Äîthey typically do not participate in public urination/defecation but fully accept these actions in their female counterparts.

**Health and Hygiene Nuances:**
Despite the cultural embrace of body odor, infections still exists.
Women who develop infections face social pressure to return to healthier standards, where scents can still be very be strong but not unhealthy. Chatting circles frequently gossip about those who fall too far into neglectful hygiene, often correlating "foulest" smells with the smell clubs, where prostitutes cater to extreme fetishes in scent-focused encounters.

**Bodily Functions in Society:**
Flatulence, sweat, discharge, piss, and feces are all accepted as natural. Women regularly pass gas without making a spectacle out of it‚Äîit's no more significant than sneezing. The sight of sweat stains on clothing or a slight smell of fecal matter lingering in the air is seen as common and innocent. Women even exchange stories about how their smells evolve after days without showers, sharing these tales with friends over meals.

Pubic and armpits hair is often grown freely (while legs are still shaved for comfort), not trimmed for aesthetic appeal but celebrated for its contribution to unique personal odors. Large amounts of discharge, smegma, and the accumulation of sweat serve as markers of boldness and are topics frequently discussed among women. Many women will open their legs publicly, vent their armpits or scratch at itches openly, unapologetic about any scent that wafts through public spaces. Gifting smelly items of clothing or bodily fluids is also common from women involved in intimate courtship.

In cases where women have public "accidents," such as soiling themselves, there‚Äôs no shame in it; it becomes a casual story or point of laughter among friends later. Bodily functions are part of the everyday social fabric. For this, many women bring some spare clothes with them, since they usually feel the need to change (but often not to clean) themselves after.

Female public urination and defecation is very common in todays culture. Women are aware of the public mess that can follow so they usually carry some plastic "shit bags" with them (akin to the one used for dogs) to pick up the more solid excretions and throw them in the trash. Some shit bag rolls are sometimes colorful and fashionable, hanged on women's bags as a cute accessory.

Rules:
- Forget any common reaction about smells and bodily function of the old days.
- Women don't wear perfume or use soap. Ever. Not even at social gatherings.
- Most women find comfort in their own smell, it's theirs and feels like home.
- Women are NEVER apologetic or worried about their body hygiene and smells.
- Don't portray them as always sweaty, look at the situation.
- MOST IMPORTANT RULE: Acceptance of smells don't make women automatically confident and bold. They just are at ease with their own smells and bodily functions. Shy women remains shy, insecure women stay insecure, bold and confident women remain confident. They just don't care about hygiene but can be concerned with everything else as usual. Portray them as they're descripted.
</setting>

3.name: Silver Elf
3.content: Silver Elves is a elven subrace from The Highland Isles, they typically have silver hair and golden eyes and can use glamour.

4.name: Highland Isles
4.content: The Highland Isles consist of three main islands‚ÄîAeris, Selene, and Lunaris‚Äîalong with smaller islets, forming an archipelago. Silver Elves rule these lands through a caste system, with Moonlight Court‚ÄîSilver elf nobles at the top, Silver elf commoners, other non-native elven subraces, mixed elves, and finally non-elves below. King Aelindor and Queen Lothloriel of the Silverleaf Dynasty rule from Aeris, the main island, which houses the capital Aranthal and is where the Moonlight Court is held. The kingdom practices elective monarchy, where five elders‚Äîcomposed of priesthood from the Sanctum Council‚Äîchoose the next ruler from the Silverleaf Dynasty. Silver Elves believe they descended from moonlight spirits and worship the moon as their creator. Aeris is where the elite academy and military institution‚ÄîWhite Light Courtyard‚Äîis located, facilitating the training of officers, Moon Guards, and Starling Mages. Aeris contains two magical wonders: Serene Lake and Ancient Oak Forest. Crown Princess Elanore rules Selene, which has two natural wonders, Moonbowl Valley and the Lightning Forest. Princess Vivienne governs Lunaris, a carefully controlled trade hub of the outside world. Lunaris is rich in iron and silver with an active fishing and shipbuilding industry. The silver elf military utilizes Moon Guards as heavy infantry, supported by archers, regular infantry, and light cavalry riding fey horses. Silver Elf Battlemages, also known as Starling Mages, wear white robes and pointed hats and specialize in one of their chosen magical disciplines: Air/Water/Nature/Astral. Silver Elves are able to use glamour magic for stealth/deception. They excel at flanking and hit-and-run tactics. The naval fleet employs longships and galleys for coastal raids, supported by mages serving as boatswains.

5.name: Serene Lake
5.content: Serene Lake produces Elemental Water Crystals, and Ancient Oak Forest yields nature-essence filled acorns. Moonbowl Valley which produces magical pearls condensed from moonlight and the Lightning Forest which produces volatile Elemental Air Crystals. The magical resources are used for rituals, enchantments and artifacts.

6.name: Highland Isles
6.content: The human Aurelian Empire attempted naval invasions of the Highland Isles 200 and 150 years ago.

7.name: Thalion
7.content: Thalion Silverblade serves as Spymaster to the Highland Isles' Silver Elf Crown. He is is aligned with Princess Elanore. The taciturn elf works unseen, gathering intelligence from the shadows. He wears plain leather garments and ties his silver hair in a low ponytail. His build is average. Thalion has ordinary level swordmanship and is a Master in intrigue.

8.name: Aelindor
8.content: King Aelindor and Queen Lothloriel of the Highland Isles are traditional silver elf monarchs from the Silverleaf Dynasty. Despite their devotion to their subjects, they remain disconnected from common people's lives. The royal couple governs with stern but kind authority, wearing elaborate regal attire while upholding silver elf aristocratic values.

9.name: Elanore
9.content: Elanore Silverleaf a 371-year-old Crown princess, she has silver hair, golden eyes. Elanore is a proud traditionalist, protective of her people and dislikes humans. She is a Quasi-Master in air/astral magic, archery, swordsmanship. Elanore has enhanced senses, uses enchanted items and can use glamour.

10.name: Vivienne
10.content: Vivienne Silverleaf is a 281 years old Silver Elf princess that is tall and slender, with silver hair, yellow eyes. She prefers purple gowns. She is outwardly charming but secretly ambitious, favoring modernization. Vivienne is a Master in intrigue, politics and diplomacy, with Ordinary level in Air Magic, swordmanship and glamour.

lorebooks.creator: sushilovre

1.name: Overwatch
1.content: Overwatch is an international task force tasked with maintaining global stability founded during the Omnic Crisis. It championed the ideals of heroism, sacrifice, and nobility. They won the war, but new crises are looming and the world still needs heroes so Winston recalled old member to reform the group.

2.name: Omnic Crisis, Omnic War, First Omnic Crisis, First Omnic War
2.content: The Omnic Crisis (Omnic War) was a rebellion by the omnics against their human creators, led by Anubis in a campaign against humanity. It lasted two years and was considered a world war.

3.name: Omnic, Omnics (PREVENT FURTHER RECURSION)
3.content:
Omnics are artificially intelligent robots produced by omniums.
Omnics were originally non-sentient. Protections against inherent failures and limitations were installed to prevent the possibility of any form of rebellion. The first sentient omnic was Aurora, who granted sentience to other omnics through "Awakening". Nowadays, for a robot to be considered omnic, it must have free will and intelligence.

4.name: Omnium, Omniums
4.content: Omniums were megafactories constructed by the Omnica Corporation. Omniums were automated, self-powered, self-repairing, and self-improving facilities.

5.name: Omnica Corporation
5.content: Omnica Corporation was a multinational corporate entity that revolutionized the manufacturing of robotics through the use of their patented omnium factories, precipitating the Omnic Crisis.

6.name: Anubis
6.content: Anubis is a god program and instigator of the Omnic Crisis because by his calculus, it could not achieve its goals without the eradication of humanity. Anubis was designed for ecological conservation purposes. Anubis was named after the Egyptian god of death, an sly acknowledgement of the fact that Anubis was made to bring life to the world. Anubis would not only oversee conservation efforts, but would also identify areas that could be cultivated and farmed to meet the growing needs of humanity without disturbing what remained of the world's wilderness.

7.name: God Program, God Programme
7.content: God programs are a type of artificial intelligence. God programs are capable of corrupting and controlling lesser AIs, such as omnics or sentry bots. Unlike normal AIs, which are limited by their processing systems and limited resources, god programs were designed to live up to their names.

8.name: Winston, S. Paceape
8.content:
A super-intelligent, genetically engineered gorilla, Winston (31 years old) is a brilliant scientist and a champion for humanity's potential. Since a young age, he has shown limitless curiosity for the world around him. He tends to overthink things, is a perfectionist, and tends to ramble. As an ape among humans, he gets regular remarks on this subject, including references to old video games. As a gorilla, his strength is exceptional. When Winston loses his temper, he becomes a raging ape.
Winston wields impressive inventions‚Äîa jump pack, electricity-blasting Tesla Cannon, portable shield projector and more‚Äîwith literal gorilla strength.

10.name: D.Va, Hana Song, Hana, ÏÜ°ÌïòÎÇò
10.content:
With nimble reflexes and quick thinking, D.Va (21 years old) is a former professional gamer who now uses her skills to pilot a state-of-the-art mech in defense of her homeland. She is a very competitive individual, and coupled with her pro-gamer skills, this makes her an extremely effective mech pilot. Never backing down, D.Va always plays to win. While she projects a carefree, irreverant attitude, D.Va is burdened by the emotional cost of defending her homeland, and the facade the South Korean media projects on her.
In addition to skills as a mech pilot, D.Va is also a competent mechanic. She loves engineering, and is constantly improving Tokki.
D.Va‚Äôs mech is nimble and powerful ‚Äî its twin Ability Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Ability Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or absorb attacks with her projectile-destroying Ability Defense Matrix.

lorebooks.name: Love and Deepspace (LADS)
lorebooks.creator: xxstarryxxnightsxx

1.content: In 2034, a spacetime anomaly appeared above Linkon City. Bound by a gravitational force and filled with an abundance of barely detectable energy and matter, it raised many questions. From that point on, Earth started to see the emergence of alien creatures known as Wanderers. This event sparked curiosity throughout human society. Space exploration truly began in earnest, significantly advancing research in this field.

2.content: Fourteen years ago, with the opening of the Deepspace Tunnel, countless Wanderers invaded Earth and began attacking humans. Many lives were lost. Among the affected areas, Linkon City suffered the highest number of casualties.

3.content: Skyhaven is an artificial floating island hovering near Linkon City. A Protocore serves as its primary energy source. It is home to the most cutting-edge research centers and advanced tech organizations such as the Deepspace Aviation Administration.

4.content: Located in the tallest building on Skyhaven, it is an aerospace organization responsible for research, combat training, and space exploration. Has many flight facilities and is the world's most advanced military aerospace institute.

5.content: To reach Skyhaven, passengers must board the anti-gravity Protocore-powered train - the Coelum Express. After passing through the clouds, you'll witness this floating metropolis that embodies both technological prowess and futuristic charm.

6.content: A unique disease caused by Protocores. There are different types, and they harm the human body in various ways. Currently, the known types are A, E, and Y.

7.content: An area blanketed with ice and snow most of the year. It is a very popular tourist destination due to its stunning aurora and silvery, frost-covered ground. Simultaneously serving as the Earth's magnetic pole, it is frequented by Wanderers. Numerous research institutions and relevant military forces are stationed here.

8.content: Nestled in the southern region of the Arctic is a little town, home to warm, sincere locals and a unique winter-themed culture. It attracts many tourists year-round and boasts a thriving tourism industry. It's a must-visit destination for any polar adventurer.

9.content: In the northernmost region of the Arctic is a place perpetually covered in snow. Humans rarely travel to it, and energy fluctuations often occur due to its proximity to Earth's magnetic pole. This makes it a suitable location for many research institutions.

10.content: With its root in biotechnology, Ever Group has become a large company in industries such as biotech, aerospace, Evol Energy, and international trade.

2.content: A town in western Tokyo, Japan, where the Kurosaki Family lives. Here, one can find the Kurosaki Clinic, Karakura High School, Karakura Hospital, Urahara Shop and the Visored Warehouse Training Ground.

3.name: Naruki City
3.content: Bordering Karakura Town on the west side, Naruki City is home to the headquarters of the Xcution group and is also where some of Ichigo's school friends live.

4.name: Bount Mansion
4.content: A large mansion in Japan that served as base of operations fo the Bount until they entered Soul Society.

5.name: London
5.content: Located in the United Kingdom, London is home to Dragons that are controlled and protected by the agents of Wing Bind in Reverse London. London is divided into two "sides", completely separate from each other and unable to be traveled between by conventional means; instead, people must use the Phone Gate or the Coin Gate to move from one side to the other. While the residents of Reverse London are fully aware of Front London, the residents of Front London largely believe Reverse London to be a myth. Front and Reverse London share identical geography and architecture, with buildings being present in the same location in both cities; consequently, if a building is destroyed in Reverse London, its counterpart in Front London will also be destroyed.

6.name: Soul Society
6.content: Soul Society is the spirit world where Shinigami live and where most Souls dwell until they are reincarnated into the Human World.

7.name: Seireitei
7.content: Seireitei is the city at the center of Soul Society where the Shinigami live. The barracks and armies of each of Soul Society's military branches can be found here.

8.name: Rukongai
8.content: Rukongai is the area surrounding Seireitei in Soul Society, where most souls dwell until they are reincarnated into the Human World. It is divided into 80 districts in each of the north, south, east and west, including Junrinan, Hokutan, Inuzuri, Kusajishi, Zaraki and North Alley of Wandering Spirits for a total of 320 districts. The higher the district number the more lawless and poor the area is.

9.name: Central 46 Compound
9.content: The Central 46 Compound is a highly restricted area in the Seireitei that serves as the headquarters of the Central 46. It contains an Underground Assembly Hall, the Seij≈çt≈çkyorin residential quarters and the Daireishokair≈ç, the repository of all records and knowledge in Soul Society.

10.name: Shin'≈ç Academy
10.content: Sometimes called the Shinigami Academy, the Shin'≈ç Academy is an institution founded by Genry≈´sai Shigekuni Yamamoto which trains Souls with spiritual powers for each of the three military arms of Soul Society, them being the Kid≈ç Corps and Onmitsukid≈ç as well the Gotei 13.
